name: Creepy Races
description:
In Creepy Races you drive a car through narrow roads full of curves and obstacles while running over the maximum possible pumpkins.Gameplay Composition
  • Driving 95%
  • Platforms 5%
Game ModesScore attack
  • The maps have a duration between 1 and 3 minutes
  • You have a button that replaces you at the last checkpoint to repeat that section and get better result
  • The final score is based on time, the number of run down pumpkins, and the checkpoints you have repeated
Length
  • 9 Scenes
  • Replay Value: High
Complexity
  • High
Art composition
  • Own art 3%
  • Asset Flip 97%
